title: [Large-Scale] Impact of Teaching Presence in Blended Learning: CoI Framework-Based Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning tool usage and intermediate language skills
context.additional_context: Need for flexible learning environments and improved practical language skills for working professional learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain how sub-elements of teaching presence (direct instruction, discussion facilitation) in blended learning environments affect social and cognitive presence
Learners can systematically implement teaching presence by designing activities based on the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework
Learners can foster meaningful peer interactions in blended learning environments using discussion facilitation strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
